name: Display CSV and Button to send data to database
Insert data row
query:
INSERT INTO username(username, user_id, first_name, last_name) 
VALUES('{{msg.username}}','{{msg.user_id}}','{{msg.first_name}}','{{msg.last_name}}')

name: UPLOAD
format:
<v-file-input show-size multiple chips :rules="rules" accept=".csv"
    variant="underlined" label="File input" v-on:change="uploadFile" v-model="value"
    active-color="primary" @update:modelValue="send({payload: value})" />

name: Convert Hex to String

template: Data has been recorded to database!

Update Data

Update username SET first_name='{{msg.first_name}}', last_name='{{msg.last_name}}'
WHERE username='{{msg.username}}'

name: create array for row data
create array for excel
Download
format:
<!-- Tombol dengan background dan border -->
<button class="md-raised nr-dashboard-form-button my-custom-button md-button md-ink-ripple" onclick="window.location.href='http://192.168.0.103:1880/download';">Download Excel</button>

<style>
    /* Gaya khusus untuk tombol */
    .my-custom-button {
        background-color: #4CAF50;
        /* Warna latar belakang */
        border: 2px solid #008CBA;
        /* Warna border */
        color: white;
        /* Warna teks */
        padding: 0 20px;
        /* Padding tombol */
        height: 65px;
        /* Tinggi tombol */
        line-height: 65px;
        /* Line height tombol */
        border-radius: 5px;
        /* Border radius */
        cursor: pointer;
        /* Pointer cursor saat hover */
        font-size: 16px; 
        /* Ukuran huruf */
    }

    .my-custom-button:hover {
        background-color: #45a049;
        /* Warna latar belakang saat hover */
    }
</style>

name: Check Data
query:
select *
FROM username
WHERE username='{{msg.username}}' or user_id='{{msg.user_id}}'
